question: Which state has raised the number of working days under MGNREGA from 100 to 150 days?
explanation:
Uttarakhand Government announced that the number of working days under the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA) will be increased from 100 to 150.
As per the Chief Minister Trivendra Singh Rawat, the entire cost will be borne by the state government. He also launched the 'Uttarakhand Aajeevika App' to help unemployed people in the state to search for job opportunities.
